law.catch_line: Within 5 days after a petition for adoption of a child is filed under this Part IV of this subtitle ...

text.section:
Within 5 days after a petition for adoption of a child is filed under this Part IV of this subtitle with a juvenile court, the clerk shall send a copy of the petition, with the notice of filing that was attached to the petition, to:
the local department; and
the child's last attorney of record in the guardianship case.
Notice under this section shall be by first-class mail.
